servinfo.title: Adjustable Steering Column Release Lever Inspection
servinfo.ptxt: Check to make sure that the followings:

item.ptxt: Steering column (1) moves smoothly when adjustable steering column release lever is at upper position (2) (i.e., steering column is not locked).
Steering column (1) is fixed securely when adjustable steering column release lever is at lower position (3) (i.e., steering column is locked).
